title: $ python eval.py --dataset RobotCar --scene loop --model mapnet recurring problem
body:
Dear Author:
　　I have some problems in the process of running the code, I can't get the right results, ask for help. Here are some details for mapnet model in RobotCar dataset:

/media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/venv/bin/python /media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/scripts/eval.py **--dataset RobotCar --scene loop --model mapnet++** --weights /media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/scripts/logs/RobotCar/RobotCar_loop_mapnet_mapnet_learn_beta_learn_gamma/epoch_300.pth.tar --config_file /media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/scripts/configs/mapnet.ini --val

Loaded weights from /media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/scripts/logs/RobotCar/RobotCar_loop_mapnet_mapnet_learn_beta_learn_gamma/epoch_300.pth.tar
Running mapnet++ on VAL data

**fatal: Not a git repository (or any parent up to mount point /media/duanzd/local)
Stopping at filesystem boundary (GIT_DISCOVERY_ACROSS_FILESYSTEM not set).
  File "/media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/dataset_loaders/robotcar.py", line 83, in __init__
    p = np.asarray(interpolate_ins_poses(pose_filename, ts[seq], ts[seq][0]))
  File "/media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/dataset_loaders/robotcar_sdk/interpolate_poses.py", line 100, in interpolate_ins_poses
    return interpolate_poses(ins_timestamps, abs_poses, pose_timestamps, origin_timestamp)
/media/duanzd/local/experiment/1/GAL/geomapnet-master/dataset_loaders/robotcar_sdk/interpolate_poses.py:143: RuntimeWarning: divide by zero encountered in divide
  (pose_timestamps[upper_indices] - pose_timestamps[lower_indices])**
